title: Y's distance
desc: Distance in cm between the two switchs of the Y axis

title: Auto save delay
desc: Time in minutes to wait between auto-saves

title: Default save path
desc: Path where you most often save

title: Calibrate
desc: Used to calibrate the system, in case it has changed

title: Speed of motors
desc: The average speed of motors in m/s

title: Step to cm
desc: Number of steps in one cm
